attributes.action: Call for the Rt. Hon. Prime Minister David Cameron to resign over abject failures of his Parliamentary decree
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, David Cameron, when falsely elected in 2010, promised an electoral petition where members of the British public could vote in local referendums on their MP's to be sacked or held to count if they were unhappy with their performances in the constituents they represent. This has not come about, and no referendum status has come about. This, by Parliamentary decree, is a matter of treason and perversion of the House of Commons, and I call for the Prime Minister to resign with immediate effect from Office.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: David Cameron to Resign as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

Created byL Dan Camm

Closing: 30/03/2015
